name: Top Trumps US Presidents
description:
George Washington vs. Barack Obama - who wins?

Top Trumps, the ‘War’ card game that pits pop culture phenomena in a battle of facts, presents a special edition for the 2012 Presidential Election.

Top Trumps US Presidents is packed with surprising facts and stats on all 44 Presidents of the USA.

Win your opponent's cards - just pick the best stat from your card and see if it trumps your opponent!

Each fully illustrated card features five key stats and a short biography of its subject, which can be perused in the Browse Pack mode.


★ Featuring ★

✓ Stats and facts on all 44 Presidents of the USA.
✓ Which President won the most votes? Who had the furthest to travel from their home to DC? And who has had the most pets?
✓ Take on three of history's greatest presidents in Easy, Medium and Hard difficulty modes.
✓ Use lifelines to get out of a tight spot.
✓ Browse fun facts and timelines of key moments in American history.

Find out about the Presidents of the USA with this classic Top Trumps deck.

★★★★★

VISIT US: www.toptrumps.com
LIKE US: www.facebook.com/toptrumps
FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/toptrumps
